title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 130.5 - Assessment by the association
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 130.5 - Assessment by the association

State Regulations

The association shall immediately establish and implement a procedure acceptable to the superintendent to assess and collect from its members, their respective shares of all amounts due relating to that portion of any estimated deficit from operations approved by the superintendent, pursuant to section
5405 (c)
of the Insurance Law and remaining after application of the funds provided for by section
5405 (d)
of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
130.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
